com.konakart.blif

Interface KKLockMgrIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KKDBLockMgrEE

    public interface KKLockMgrIf
    Defines the interfaces for Lock management

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        boolean acquire(java.lang.String lockName)
         throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Acquire a lock.

        Guarantees to return a lock for the specified object (if locking is enabled).

        It will sleep and retry until the timeout at which point it will remove any existing lock and acquire it for the current thread.

        If locking is disabled this will return false without doing anything. The enabled/disabled state is set by the konakart.lockAPIs.enabled property in konakart.properties.

        The sleep quantity is defined by the konakart.lockAPIs.sleepMS property in konakart.properties.

        The timeout quantity is defined by the konakart.lockAPIs.timeoutMS property in konakart.properties.

        Parameters:
        lockName - the name of the object to acquire the lock for. Use any String less than 32 characters in length.
        Returns:
        true if a lock was acquired otherwise false
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception

      • acquire

        boolean acquire(java.lang.String lockName,
                int sleepMS,
                int timeoutMS)
         throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Acquire a lock.

        Guarantees to return a lock for the specified object (if locking is enabled).

        It will sleep and retry until the timeout at which point it will remove any existing lock and acquire it for the current thread.

        If locking is disabled this will return false without doing anything. The enabled/disabled state is set by the konakart.lockAPIs.enabled property in konakart.properties.

        Parameters:
        lockName - the name of the object to acquire the lock for. Use any String less than 32 characters in length.
        sleepMS - number of milliseconds to sleep between attempts to acquire the lock
        timeoutMS - number of milliseconds to wait before forcibly acquiring the lock
        Returns:
        true if a lock was acquired otherwise false
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception

      • release

        void release(java.lang.String lockName)
      throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Release a lock for the specified object.
        Parameters:
        lockName - the name of the object to release the lock on
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception

             throws com.konakart.app.KKException

        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception
